step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! You're stretching your arm overhead and preparing to open your hand.
Great job opening your hand wide and relaxing your muscles as you exhale.
Nicely done making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling.
Good job on the second rep, maintaining that overhead stretch.
You're doing great keeping your arm overhead as you prepare to open your hand.
Excellent work opening your hand wide and exhaling to relax.
Fantastic! You made a strong fist while inhaling. Keep visualizing that lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm stretched overhead and focus on opening your hand wide while exhaling and making a fist while inhaling. Keep up the good work promoting lymph flow!
